Package camzup.core

Class Transform2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Transform
camzup.core.Transform2
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITransform, IUtils, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Transform2
extends Transform
Facilitates 2D affine transformations for entities.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Transform2.Easing
    An easing function to facilitate animating multiple transforms.

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface camzup.core.ITransform

    ITransform.Order

    • multDir

      public static Vec2 multDir​(Transform2 t, Vec2 source, Vec2 target)
      Multiplies a direction by a transform. This rotates the direction by the transform's rotation.
      Parameters:
      t - the transform
      source - the input direction
      target - the output direction
      Returns:
      the direction
      See Also:
      Vec2.rotateZ(Vec2, float, Vec2)

    • multPoint

      public static Vec2 multPoint​(Transform2 t, Vec2 source, Vec2 target)
      Multiplies a point by a transform. This rotates the point, multiplies the point by the scale, then adds the translation.
      Parameters:
      t - the transform
      source - the input point
      target - the output point
      Returns:
      the point
      See Also:
      Vec2.rotateZ(Vec2, float, Vec2)

    • multVector

      public static Vec2 multVector​(Transform2 t, Vec2 source, Vec2 target)
      Multiplies a vector by a transform. This rotates the vector by the transform's rotation and then multiplies it by the transform's scale.
      Parameters:
      t - the transform
      source - the input vector
      target - the output vector
      Returns:
      the vector
      See Also:
      Vec2.rotateZ(Vec2, float, Vec2)
